page.title: 13HEALTH
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE HOMES CATERING FOR THE RETIRED AND HANDICAPPED. {TELFORD COURT,}A RETIREMENT HOME, HAS 27 FLATS AND 6 BUNGALOWS. WE INTER- VIEWED THE RESIDENTS AGED BETWEEN 6O - 9O. 3 OF THEM DID VOLUNTARY WORK IN THE COMMUNITY THE REST DIDN'T. 5 PEOPLE DIDN'T HAVE A FAMILY BUT 16DID. ONLY 8 PEOPLE SAW A DOCTOR MONTHLY. 3 PEOPLE HAD HELP IN THE HOUSE AND 18 DIDN'T. 1 HAD TO HAVE HELP TO MAKE A MEAL, 2O COULD MAKE THEIR OWN. { STRODE PARK'S}PURPOSE IS CARING FOR PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED PEOPLE. THERE ARE 24 WOMEN AND 18 MEN. OVER 5O PEOPLE WORK AS CARE ASSISTANTS, NURSES AND OFFICE STAFF. THERE ARE MANY LOUNGES AND A DINING ROOM AT STRODE PARK. ALSO THERE ARE SPECIAL MOBILE HOMES FOR PEOPLE'S HOLIDAYS. THERE ARE HISTORY,ART & SOCIAL CLUBS AND A WORKSHOP WHERE THEY CAN DO NEEDLEWORK.
